adjectives.description: aguey (comparative more aguey, superlative most aguey)

entries.meaning: In the state of having a high fever accompanied by shaking or shivering.
examples: One is jaundiced, aguey, feverish or out of sorts in some other way.
...where our people inhale liberty in the air they breathe, unmingled with the malaria of States located in that aguey country along the beautiful Ohio.
